New Records: James Harden's 13 assists in the first half were the most by a Clippers player before halftime going back to 1996-97.
Key Match Events: Kawhi Leonard added 12 points in his first game of the season.
Ivica Zubac had 18 points and 18 rebounds.
Trae Young led Atlanta with 20 points and 14 assists.
The Clippers had a 27-4 run in the second quarter.
Leonard hit a 3-pointer on his first shot from the left wing with 9:57 remaining in the first quarter.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hawks: Guard Jalen Johnson did not play due to right shoulder soreness. Guard Bogdan Bogdanovic also did not play due to injury management.
Clippers: Terance Mann also returned to the lineup and scored 12 points in 16 minutes. Mann missed 10 games due to a broken middle finger on his left hand.
